name: Roll Space Roll
description:
"This is worth the megabytes." - Mark Brown



How to play:

W A S D - to move

SPACE - when the number on your dice matches the enemies

Dodge and destroy enemy cubes by hitting space, when your cube's number matches the enemy's. 
If you press Space when there are no enemies with same number - you'll recieve damage. 
Also don't fall into the pit!



Exit is not implemented so good old Alt+F4 will help you to close the game :D
Have fun!

Take a screenshot of your high score and share in the comments below)

Music:
Nekko Thunder - Impostor
